item.title: How I Implemented Full-Text Search On My Website
item.description: This article walks you through how I used Lunr.js to add powerful search capabilities to a Next.js static site, dealing with challenges like client-side processing and optimizing for performance along the way. Link to article: https://www.milanjovanovic.tech/blog/how-i-implemented-full-text-search-on-my-website
